name: Rhythm Match (ZulwarnX)
description:
A browser-based game for testing your rhythm-matching skills.

Rhythm Match is a simple game for testing rhythm listening and reading skills. Listen to the pattern, click the correct rhythm, and avoid getting three strikes!

Controls: Left click to navigate and select. (Touch also works on mobile devices.)

Version 1.0 – Levels 1-5 are working. This covers quarter notes, eighth notes, quarter rests, half notes, four sixteenth notes, and two eighth paired with two sixteenth notes. Endless is also working in beta mode (not finished). It also works with one level.

If people are interested in my fleshing out this game more, I could add:

  • More levels and rhythms
  • Endless Mode with more rhythms
  • Better visuals and assets (Hey, I’m getting better)
  • A Leaderboard function to track everyone’s High Score

But this stuff takes time (and money) I don’t have for these projects right now.
